text: Tymofiy Sheremeta (; born 6 October 1995 in Khmelnytskyi, Ukraine) is a professional Ukrainian football goalkeeper who currently plays for FC Lokomotiv Yerevan in the Armenian First League. ==Career== Sheremeta is a product of FC Podillya and Metalurh Zaporizhya Youth Sportive School Systems. His first trainers were Oleksandr Porytskyi (in FC Podillya) and Oleksandr Rudyka (in FC Metalurh). He made his debut for Metalurh Zaporizhya in the Ukrainian Premier League in a match against FC Dynamo Kyiv on 30 May 2015. In 2019, Sheremeta joined Armenian club Lokomotiv Yerevan.2018-2019 ARMENIA CHAMPIONSHIP. FIRST LEAGUE, LOKOMOTIV - FC BANANTS-2, ffa.ma, 28 May 2019 ==References == == External links == * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:FC Metalurh-2 Zaporizhya players Category:FC Metalurh Zaporizhya players Category:FK Riteriai players Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:Ukrainian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Lithuania Category:Ukrainian expatriate sportspeople in Lithuania
title: Tymofiy Sheremeta
